caption.body: Student filmmakers Marion Philippe, Kayu Leung, Théo Jamin, Jean-Géraud Blanc from France’s MoPA School of Animation immerse us in the life of eight-and-a-half-year-old Louis, allowing us to step into his shoes and understand his unique perspective of the world.   See “Louis’ Shoes” by Marion Philippe, Kayu Leung, Théo Jamin, Jean-Géraud Blanc in the Video Arts Gallery, located pre-security in the International Terminal with daily operating hours of 5:00am to 10:00pm, or online at: https://bit.ly/3Dpyd4s
caption.excerpt: Student filmmakers Marion Philippe, Kayu Leung, Théo Jamin, Jean-Géraud Blanc from France’s MoPA School of Animation immerse us in the life of eight-and-a-half-year-old Louis, allowing us to step into his shoes and understand his unique perspective of the world.
